about_the_game:
The Lords of the Earth Flame (TLotEF) Original Soundtrack by Alexander "Splinterfeel" Novikov features more than 20 minutes of music created exclusively for the game, fully remastered for this release and with all-new bonus material.

MP3-format files will be placed in your TLotEF folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\The Lords of the Earth Flame\Soundtrack
